issue.title: DF - Add type to Unexpected accumulator state message
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11246](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11246). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Hello!

 

From the error message on user side, it's not possible to detect what type was passed and try to debug the problem.
